main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a strange object in the sky over Wilmington, Delaware on 14 December 1956, describing it as a bright light that exhibited unusual movements.
interesting points: The primary object was described as having a long streak-shaped tail and brilliant bluish-green color., The observations included both civilians and a radio mathematician who reported seeing the object move rapidly and disappear., Witnesses noted that the object did not resemble any known aircraft or meteor., Several witnesses corroborated each other's accounts of the sightings., The sightings were recorded in the Project Blue Book files as being of significant interest.
sighted object: a bright round light and an object with a long streak-shaped tail
witness description: Civilians, including a radio mathematician and several friends who observed the bright lights together.
